rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A primary bedroom with Art Deco detailing, ample natural light and a private balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2

rooms.description: Attached en-suite bathroom with integrated storage and minimalist Art Deco fixtures.

rooms.name: Dining Area

rooms.name: Utility & Storage
rooms.description: A small utility space for maintenance equipment and storage cabinets, ensuring efficient use of space.
